user_query: I'm planning a family gathering and I want to include a trivia session. Can you fetch me a game level from the Music Trivia API and provide me with a trivia fact about food and drink? Additionally, share a Chuck Norris joke to make everyone laugh.

TaskList.description: Fetch a game level from the Music Trivia API for the trivia session.
Retrieve a trivia fact about food and drink.
Get a Chuck Norris joke for entertainment.
